channel.title: Fashion on Philip Mitroi
channel.description: Recent content in Fashion on Philip Mitroi

item.title: Stas
item.description:
A session with my friend Stas

Stas is one of my closest friends, he’s an emerging artist from Toronto who you can find on soundcloud under the moniker Yani. I think he and I go for a shoot at least once every week. On top of taking pictures for him, I also produce a great deal of music for him. In these industries I find it very important to have someone around who you can work with on anything, messages may be lost in translation should the aesthetic or message be limited to a single format. By allowing me to work with him on both visual and acoustic platforms, we achieve a unique aesthetic that is consistent all across the board of his brand, with more control than assembling content from sources produced by different people.

soundcloud.com/babyboiyani

Check out some more photos from the session below:

item.title: Selection from a retail catalog
item.description:
A collection of images that were used for advertising and promo for my friend’s retail business.

Naturally, one of the first people I shot with was Stas. You can see other projects I’ve done with him on the website’s homepage, just look for his image! In a more corporate setting, you would probably find a team of people working on this project. Beyond the photographer, there would probably be a stylist and a team for hair/makeup, as well as someone to act as the project’s creative director. Luckily for us, Stas already has an affinity for luxury fashion and portraying it in a way that would make it appealing. As a person who is also interested in some of the brands that the store offers (Rick Owens, Supreme, Bape, etc), doing this project was a blast.

Check out some of the images below:
